blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Revenge Fantasy
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2t536I2

by aliaoftwoworlds

Steve and his team accidentally run into Tony when they’re out hunting HYDRA, and everything goes downhill from there.

Words: 5278, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

Series: Part 10 of Bitter Retribution

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Vision (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Additional Tags: Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), not team Cap friendly, and particularly not wanda friendly, Author is Bitter, Hurt Tony, Civil War Team Iron Man


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2t536I2

question: Jen Walters!
answer:
• favorite thing about her: everything. especially how she becomes self-confident by redefining femininity in a way that sort of subverts it - instead of liking herself more as small and skinny, she prefers to be big and boisterous and strong. also i love the fact that shes trans
  • favorite line: “Oh great! Some anonymous bad guy is ready to spend three million bucks to find out how tough I am…and I know how these things work! It’ll be at least my third issue before I find out who it is! Although you readers will probably find out on the next page…”
  • brotp: her and bruce :) 
  • otp: jen/betty
  • notp: her with any man
  • random headcanon: she’s the only hulk who can drive but she cant cook for shit
  • unpopular opinion: men shouldn’t draw her
  • song i associate with her: girl anachronism 
  • favorite pictuer of her:

blog.name: writethroughmyheart
blog.title: WriteThroughMyHeart
blog.description:
Just a loki hoe.               
All original content

summary: Right. So. I keep thinking about [spoiler] Red Skull's appearance in Infinity War and how that's going to affect the mcu. Cus,...
body:
Right. So. I keep thinking about [spoiler] Red Skull’s appearance in Infinity War and how that’s going to affect the mcu. Cus, he’s like a bad guy and all evil and stuff. My first thought was he’s going to pose a major problem for the avengers but the i remembered something from Captain America: the first avenger.

Red Skull is the ultimate Thor fan boy.

Remember how he kept going on and on about the gods and how the tesseract was actually from asgard? Well imagine when he actually meets Thor. And he’s all like, im not worthy and bowing before him. Thor’s kinda like, well this is awkward but the avengers see the advantage this gives them and play along with it. So Thor’s having to act all high and mighty, he goes back to ‘shakespeare in the park’ speak. He’s trying really hard but he’s just not that good at acting godly.

Then imagine when Red Skull meets loki.

For loki, there’s no acting needed. In fact when thor says 'act godly, he thinks we’re gods.’ loki replies: 'we are gods’. Cut to 3 days later when loki, undoubtedly, is abusing his new found godhood by bossing around the avengers, making then pamper and worship him or else he’ll 'smite’ them. Inevitably, loki takes it too far and asks Tony to fetch him 'the fairest virgin in the land, or simply the closest. Rodgers will do.’ Tony finally breaks, turns round to loki and says: 'you’re not a god. I saw you threaten the vacuum cleaner with a knife because it was a foul serpent that devoured your socks.’

Red Skull realises he’s been had, puts on his MAGA hat and moves to Charlottesville.

summary: Another MARVEL gay crack #1 I honestly tried not to overgay it... but yeah, I failed. Steve/Tony, Thor/Loki, some T’Challa/Bucky...
caption:
Another MARVEL gay crack #1

I honestly tried not to overgay it… but yeah, I failed.

Steve/Tony, Thor/Loki, some T’Challa/Bucky and Tony/Bruce, and also a tiny bit of Tony/Thor (because Tony is so gay I just can’t )

It’s rus/eng, so I also made a

Translated version for those who don’t speak Russian / Перевод для тех, у кого плохо с английским. 

It’s lame, but well, I suck at translating poetry/songs, no can do / Ничего нелепее, чем перевод песен от меня, вы в этой жизни не видели, но это все, что я могу предложить х)

blog.name: number8thekiller
blog.title: 00.08 "The Killer"
blog.description:
Name is Sam Allen (Pen name)
I will accept asks and all. It may take me awhile to respond, but I will try.
Story writer and aesthetic maker///Her/She//House: Hufflepuff
A supporter of LGBT+.
Sexuality: Bisexual
Single as ever
I'm in band and marching band. I play the flute and I am learning how to play the violin.
I'm not telling you my age. I am older than 15 btw. 
I write for a living. It helps me with my anxiety, social anxiety, depression, and maladaptive daydreaming. I never really finish any of my work (so sorry about that).
If you need someone to talk to I am here! You aren't alone!!
Celebrity Crushes: Édgar Ramírez, Tom Holland, Robert Sheehan, Roger Taylor, Freddie Mercury, Jennifer Lawerance, Gal Gadot, and many more!
Fandoms: Marvel, Some DC, Harry Potter, Shadowhunters, Umbrella Academy, Queen (my favorite band), and many more.

body:
Captain’s Orders (Steve X Reader)

Y/N = Your Name

Y/S/N = Superhero Name

“Y/S/N, get back here!” Steve ordered you to do.

You both were currently on a mission to retrieve a bunch of Shield agents. You were rationally thinking the whole time on the mission. Your brother was one of the agents missing.

“No can do Captain,” you said into your earpiece. You heard the Captain sighed.

“Y/N get back here!” He put a bit more sternness into his voice.

You groaned and switched the earpiece off. You were so close to getting into the base, you couldn’t stop, you wouldn’t. You couldn’t give up now. You ran through the misty forest as fast as you could. Dodging and blocking gunshots.

You soon find yourself inside the base. You don’t remember stumbling inside the base at all. You think your actions and heart are blocking your memories and thinking.

“Y/N!” You turned around and found Steve running after you. The doors of the base closed before he even got to you.

You gulped as you knew there was no way for him to get through. You could also hear his shield collide with the steel door. You decided to turn your earpiece on. All you could hear from it was static.

“Just fantastic,” you muttered to yourself.

“Indeed.” You gasped and turned around, to find your brother standing only a few feet away from you.

“Johnny!” you cried as you ran up to him. He pulled you into a bone-crushing hug. “What are you doing here? I mean free. I…I thought you were being held, prisoner?” You asked as you pulled away from him.

“Such a shame you thought that.” Johnny dug something out of his pocket and stabbed it into your neck.

“Why?” You darkly asked.

“Because I have too.” That is the last thing you heard before everything went black.

°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°

Steve ran from the entrance of the base to find a different way in. He knew you were getting into more danger the longer you stayed in there.

“Y/N, pick up, Y/S/N!” He constantly said into the earpiece. All he got back was static.

He jumped up onto an abandoned car and glanced around quickly. The number of Hydra agents decreased in the last minute or two. Steve took note that it was probably because they got to you already.

A Hydra agent noticed Steve and went to go at him. Steve jumped off the car and got ahold of the agent. He rammed and held the agent against the car.

“Do you know where Y/S/N is?” Steve shouted at the agent.

“Inside with the other agents, probably being hypnotized now.” Steve groaned and knocked the agent with his shield on the top of his head. The agent fell to the ground, passed out. Steve took off in the direction of the base. He was now really determined to find you. He didn’t want to lose you, he couldn’t handle losing you.

He found his way in when a bunch of agents poured out of the base. He took them out and slipped inside.

°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°

You woke up cold and chained to a chair. Your neck was throbbing from where Johnny stabbed it with the needle.

“Good, you are awake.” You looked at where the voice came from. Johnny sat in a chair a few feet from yours. He had this kidish grin on.

“You betrayed me.” You moaned as you were trying to fully wake up now.

“Betray my sister? I would never!” Johnny faked his surprised voice. He was a terrible lier, ever since you two were little.

“Johnny, stop lying for once!” Your voice stern, but was shaking a little.

“For once! I never lied to you!” Johnny shot up out of his chair and strolled towards you. He held onto your throat, as he spoke in your ear.

“I am doing this for us, not just for myself. I love you sister and I want what’s best for you.” You would have laughed if you weren’t choking from his grip.

Suddenly Johnny took his hand off and backed up slightly. He was holding his stomach and blood was dripping from his mouth. You wanted to scream for your brother, but you knew he needs to die. Johnny took a sharp intake of breath and fell to the ground. He was dead at your feet, with a pile of blood around him.

You looked up to see Steve holding a gun in your direction. He dropped it and ran over to you. He untied you and checked you over.

“I’m fine, Steve.” You said as he helped you up out of your chair and took you in his arms.

“You can’t walk. I know what they used on you. They used it on me once.” He wasn’t going to put you down or let no be an answer. Steve was right. You couldn’t feel or move your toes, feet, or legs.

He carried you through the now shield base, as you have been out for about three hours. The only way Steve was going to find you took over the base, which he did.

“Why was my brother acting like that?” You asked after a minute of silence.

“He was hypnotized. Most Hydra agents are hypnotized nowadays.” You decided to remain silent as he carried you to one of the Quinn Jets. He placed you down on one of the seats.

“Is it bad that I don’t want to cry over him?” Steve sighed and took a seat next to you.

“No, it’s not bad, but not good. You should feel a bit sad. He was your brother.”

“Thanks, Steve, and I’m sorry that I didn’t follow your orders.”

“It was captain’s orders, and I think you won’t be able to make it up to me,” Steve smirked playfully. “Unless you allow me to take you on a date.” You smiled and blushed slightly.

“What happens if I say no?”

“You can’t.”

“Why?” You raised your eyebrow questioningly.

“Because It’s captain’s orders.” His smirk turned into a full-blown smile.

“Ugh, fine. As you wish. I would love to go on a date with you.”

“Good, because you should always follow your captain’s orders even if they seem a little wrong to you at the moment.”

reblog.comment:
Captain’s Orders (Steve X Reader)

Y/N = Your Name

Y/S/N = Superhero Name

“Y/S/N, get back here!” Steve ordered you to do.

You both were currently on a mission to retrieve a bunch of Shield agents. You were rationally thinking the whole time on the mission. Your brother was one of the agents missing.

“No can do Captain,” you said into your earpiece. You heard the Captain sighed.

“Y/N get back here!” He put a bit more sternness into his voice.

You groaned and switched the earpiece off. You were so close to getting into the base, you couldn’t stop, you wouldn’t. You couldn’t give up now. You ran through the misty forest as fast as you could. Dodging and blocking gunshots.

You soon find yourself inside the base. You don’t remember stumbling inside the base at all. You think your actions and heart are blocking your memories and thinking.

“Y/N!” You turned around and found Steve running after you. The doors of the base closed before he even got to you.

You gulped as you knew there was no way for him to get through. You could also hear his shield collide with the steel door. You decided to turn your earpiece on. All you could hear from it was static.

“Just fantastic,” you muttered to yourself.

“Indeed.” You gasped and turned around, to find your brother standing only a few feet away from you.

“Johnny!” you cried as you ran up to him. He pulled you into a bone-crushing hug. “What are you doing here? I mean free. I…I thought you were being held, prisoner?” You asked as you pulled away from him.

“Such a shame you thought that.” Johnny dug something out of his pocket and stabbed it into your neck.

“Why?” You darkly asked.

“Because I have too.” That is the last thing you heard before everything went black.

°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°

Steve ran from the entrance of the base to find a different way in. He knew you were getting into more danger the longer you stayed in there.

“Y/N, pick up, Y/S/N!” He constantly said into the earpiece. All he got back was static.

He jumped up onto an abandoned car and glanced around quickly. The number of Hydra agents decreased in the last minute or two. Steve took note that it was probably because they got to you already.

A Hydra agent noticed Steve and went to go at him. Steve jumped off the car and got ahold of the agent. He rammed and held the agent against the car.

“Do you know where Y/S/N is?” Steve shouted at the agent.

“Inside with the other agents, probably being hypnotized now.” Steve groaned and knocked the agent with his shield on the top of his head. The agent fell to the ground, passed out. Steve took off in the direction of the base. He was now really determined to find you. He didn’t want to lose you, he couldn’t handle losing you.

He found his way in when a bunch of agents poured out of the base. He took them out and slipped inside.

°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°

You woke up cold and chained to a chair. Your neck was throbbing from where Johnny stabbed it with the needle.

“Good, you are awake.” You looked at where the voice came from. Johnny sat in a chair a few feet from yours. He had this kidish grin on.

“You betrayed me.” You moaned as you were trying to fully wake up now.

“Betray my sister? I would never!” Johnny faked his surprised voice. He was a terrible lier, ever since you two were little.

“Johnny, stop lying for once!” Your voice stern, but was shaking a little.

“For once! I never lied to you!” Johnny shot up out of his chair and strolled towards you. He held onto your throat, as he spoke in your ear.

“I am doing this for us, not just for myself. I love you sister and I want what’s best for you.” You would have laughed if you weren’t choking from his grip.

Suddenly Johnny took his hand off and backed up slightly. He was holding his stomach and blood was dripping from his mouth. You wanted to scream for your brother, but you knew he needs to die. Johnny took a sharp intake of breath and fell to the ground. He was dead at your feet, with a pile of blood around him.

You looked up to see Steve holding a gun in your direction. He dropped it and ran over to you. He untied you and checked you over.

“I’m fine, Steve.” You said as he helped you up out of your chair and took you in his arms.

“You can’t walk. I know what they used on you. They used it on me once.” He wasn’t going to put you down or let no be an answer. Steve was right. You couldn’t feel or move your toes, feet, or legs.

He carried you through the now shield base, as you have been out for about three hours. The only way Steve was going to find you took over the base, which he did.

“Why was my brother acting like that?” You asked after a minute of silence.

“He was hypnotized. Most Hydra agents are hypnotized nowadays.” You decided to remain silent as he carried you to one of the Quinn Jets. He placed you down on one of the seats.

“Is it bad that I don’t want to cry over him?” Steve sighed and took a seat next to you.

“No, it’s not bad, but not good. You should feel a bit sad. He was your brother.”

“Thanks, Steve, and I’m sorry that I didn’t follow your orders.”

“It was captain’s orders, and I think you won’t be able to make it up to me,” Steve smirked playfully. “Unless you allow me to take you on a date.” You smiled and blushed slightly.

“What happens if I say no?”

“You can’t.”

“Why?” You raised your eyebrow questioningly.

“Because It’s captain’s orders.” His smirk turned into a full-blown smile.

“Ugh, fine. As you wish. I would love to go on a date with you.”

“Good, because you should always follow your captain’s orders even if they seem a little wrong to you at the moment.”
